sentences.en: And she said, Thy signet , and thy bracelets, and thy staff that is in thine hand.
sentences.cn: 他玛说, 你的印, 你的带子, 和你手里的杖.

sentences.en: If I had been, I would have set my signet on the biter.
sentences.cn: 如果我被咬了, 我会在咬我的狗上留下印章的.

sentences.en: Objective To investigate the clinical and pathological features primary signet - ring cell carcinoma of the urinary tract.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨泌尿道原发性印戒细胞癌的临床和病理特征.

sentences.en: On histopathological tumor was characterized by large amount of signet - ring cells, adenoid structures and mucoid pools.
sentences.cn: 组织学以大片印戒样癌细胞 、 腺管样结构及粘液池形成为特征.

sentences.en: Signet cell types tend to grow more rapidly.
The fateful call came that evening, informing us that the recovered body had a signet ring with the initials JKJ—Jeffrey Kelly James.
sentences.cn: 当晚致命的电话打来了，通知我们被发现的遗体上有一个图章戒指，其上有首字母缩写JKJ 杰弗里·凯利·詹姆斯。

sentences.en: The order was sealed with the king's signet.
sentences.cn: 这一命令是用国王的印记加封的.

sentences.en: The paper requests signet, not signatures.
sentences.cn: 这张纸要求图章而不是签名.
